definition: to bear/to carry (on one's back)/to turn one's back on/to be defeated/negative (math. etc)

square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter

sentences.english: The referee's decision was contested by the loser.
sentences.chinese: 负方对裁判的裁决有异议。

sentences.english: All those lose in First Round will be arranged to play the consolation matches.
sentences.chinese: 第一圈赛事负方会获安排参加遗材赛。

victory or defeat/the outcome of a battle
and so on/in a similar fashion
